title: Reliable & Motivated VA for Digital Marketing Agency
job_overview:
Philadelphia-based digital marketing agency looking for a virtual assistant to help with various tasks on an ongoing basis.

This position is for an 8-hour shift, with a minimum of 4 hours between 8 a.m. and 5 p.m. Eastern Time.

The following skills are required:
1. Willingness to learn
2. Tech-savvy
3. Detail-oriented
4. Ability to follow SOPs

Tasks may include:
-Client onboarding
-Google Sheets template setup
-WooCommerce Product Creation
-WordPress Blog Creation (Content provided by agency)
-Basic WordPress Edits Tasks
-Online Research
-Data Entry
-Email management

Experience with the following tools is a plus (but not required):
-ClickUp
-Ahrefs
-SEMrush
-Google Workspace
-Canva
-WordPress, Bricks Builder, Elementor
-ChatGPT, Gemini
-GoHighLevel

I look forward to your application and hope to make a hire in the next week! Please include the following with your resume/application:
-Why would you be a good fit for this position?
-The word giraffe
-What are two things that excite you about this opportunity?

Thank you!
Jared
Elevated Audience
